title: Ticket #631: VM version information should only exist in STARTD_EXPR, if anywhere
description: The VM universe requests that version information about the hypervisor is configured in the startd. This information is only used to help matching, iff the job knows and/or cares. Instead of required configuration it should be added on an as needed basis via STARTD_EXPRS/ATTRS on the startd.
remarks:
2009-Oct-05 14:54:11 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to V7_4-branch.
